email_chain.subject: Inquiry: Iron Ore Shipment from Tubarão to Qingdao
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Khan,

We are looking to charter a vessel for a shipment of 150,000MT of iron ore from Tubarão to Qingdao on CIF terms. The required laycan is October 10-15. Could you please provide a quote and vessel availability?

Best regards,
John Smith

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry: Iron Ore Shipment from Tubarão to Qingdao
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Smith,

Thank you for your inquiry. I can offer the vessel MV OCEAN STAR, DWT 180,000, LOA 290m, currently available for your cargo. The rate is USD 22 per MT. Laycan is October 10-15. Demurrage is USD 20,000 per day. Please let me know if this works for you.

Best regards,
Ali Khan

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry: Iron Ore Shipment from Tubarão to Qingdao
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Khan,

Thank you for the quick response. The rate seems a bit high compared to the current market. Can you revise to USD 20 per MT? Also, can you confirm the loading window and any additional terms?

Best regards,
John Smith

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry: Iron Ore Shipment from Tubarão to Qingdao
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Smith,

Given the current market conditions, I can offer a revised rate of USD 21 per MT. The loading window is 72 hours, and the demurrage rate remains at USD 20,000 per day. Please let me know if this is acceptable.

Best regards,
Ali Khan

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry: Iron Ore Shipment from Tubarão to Qingdao
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Khan,

USD 21 per MT is acceptable. Please proceed with the booking for MV OCEAN STAR with a laycan of October 10-15. Kindly send over the charter party for review.

Best regards,
John Smith

email_chain.subject: Fwd: Charter Party for MV OCEAN STAR
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Smith,

Thank you for confirming. Attached is the charter party for your review. Please let me know if any adjustments are needed.

Best regards,
Ali Khan

email_chain.subject: Re: Fwd: Charter Party for MV OCEAN STAR
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Khan,

The charter party looks good. We will proceed as discussed. Thank you for your assistance.

Best regards,
John Smith
